sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO kobayMember( memberUnq, memberId, memberPwd, memberName, memberPhone, memberRdate, memberMdate ) VALUES( member_seq.NEXTVAL, '$memberId$', '$memberPwd$', '$memberName$', '$memberPhone$', sysdate, sysdate )
sqlMap.select: SELECT memberUnq, memberId, memberPwd, memberName, memberPhone, TO_CHAR(memberRdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') memberRdate FROM kobayMember
SELECT memberUnq, memberId, memberName, memberPhone, TO_CHAR(memberRdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') memberRdate, TO_CHAR(memberMdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') memberMdate FROM kobayMember WHERE memberId = '$memberId$'
SELECT COUNT(memberId) FROM kobayMember WHERE memberId = #memberId#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE kobayMember SET memberPwd='$memberPwd$', memberName='$memberName$', memberPhone='$memberPhone$', memberMdate = sysdate WHERE memberUnq = '$memberUnq$'

isNotNull.isNotEmpty: SELECT a.memberPwd, a.memberCount FROM (SELECT memberPwd, COUNT(memberPwd) memberCount, memberName, memberPhone, MemberId FROM kobayMember GROUP BY memberPwd) a WHERE a.memberName = '$memberName$' AND a.memberPhone = '$memberPhone$' AND a.memberId = '$memberId$'

isNull.isEmpty: SELECT a.memberId, a.memberCount FROM (SELECT memberId, COUNT(memberId) memberCount, memberName, memberPhone FROM kobayMember GROUP BY memberId) a WHERE a.memberName = '$memberName$' AND a.memberPhone = '$memberPhone$'
